name: Omnicron Ceti
description:
This is a small tower defense inspired game about evacuating the crew from a space station in the face of an overwhelming assault.   You must balance the use of your limited resources as the space station becomes more damaged and you have fewer and fewer crew to run it.


With this game I'm experimenting with the idea of taking a "subtractive" approach to tower defense - instead of building up defenses to fend off an enemy, as is typical in the genre, I wanted to see what it is like to instead have to tear down defenses  while escaping in the best way possible.
